properties.areaDesc: Lewis, KY; Greenup, KY; Adams, OH; Scioto, OH
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 12 at 3:06PM EST until February 16 at 12:08PM EST by NWS Wilmington OH
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a Flood Warning
for the following rivers...

Ohio River at Portsmouth
Ohio River at Cincinnati

The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Ohio River at Portsmouth
* From late Thursday night to Sunday afternoon.
* At 2 PM the stage was 46.0 feet.
* Flood stage is 50 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* The river will rise above flood stage late Thursday evening and
continue to rise to near 51.2 feet by Friday evening. The river will
fall below flood stage by Sunday morning.
* At stages near 51.0 feet, low-lying flooding occurs along the southern
border of Scioto County, as well as in South Portsmouth.  Routes 73
and 239 are closed near the Ohio River. Much of Portsmouth itself is
protected by flood walls.
properties.instruction:
Safety message...Do not drive your car through flooded roadways. The
water depth may be deeper than it appears.


Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather All Hazards
radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit
water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
